title: Question 18
prompt: (1) The basketball team arrived in Germany for the international championship game. (2) German food is delicious, but you should ask about top restaurants before heading out. (3) The team was prepared for the big game and ready to take home a victory. (4) They began their practice with some intense drills and warm-ups.
description: Choose the sentence that does <u>not</u> belong in the paragraph.
feedback: Sentence 2 does not support the topic sentence. The topic sentence reads, “The basketball team arrived in Germany for the international championship game.”  All of the other sentences support or give details about the topic sentence, except for sentence 2.  Sentence 2 discusses food and restaurants, which is not related to the topic sentence.
